channel.title: Could Someone Help With My Source?
channel.description:
Hey all
I need some help. I am making a source and need to log into it so I can take pictures and see what I can change and stuff. But for some weird reason I can't log in! This is all what I do:
Open No-IP. Open my source Click runserver - It says, Online. Go to Silab so I can log in. I type in my username and password And click login. It keep saying: "Error Connecting To Server." I tried using my No-IP address, still don't work. I tried leaving the Server spot blank, still didn't work. I tried typing in 0.0.0.0, nope - don't work. I tried 127.0.0.0, nope. I tried 127.0.0.1, noooope!
And I still can't log in..Could anyone tell me what to do so I can log in?! Any help is very much appreciated.
Thank you

item.title: Could Someone Help With My Source?
item.dc:creator: @Edp32281 Edp32281
item.description:
@Edp32281 wrote:

Do you have the server thing open? And try the 0.0.0.0 ip address. If that don’t work i really don’t know i will keep thinking of somthing.

Read full topic

item.title: Could Someone Help With My Source?
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Fait Ancient Fait
item.description:
@Ancient_Fait wrote:

Hey all

I need some help. I am making a source and need to log into it so I can take pictures and see what I can change and stuff.
But for some weird reason I can’t log in! This is all what I do:

Open No-IP.
Open my source
Click runserver - It says, Online.
Go to Silab so I can log in.
I type in my username and password
And click login. It keep saying: “Error Connecting To Server.”
I tried using my No-IP address, still don’t work.
I tried leaving the Server spot blank, still didn’t work.
I tried typing in 0.0.0.0, nope - don’t work.
I tried 127.0.0.0, nope.
I tried 127.0.0.1, noooope!

And I still can’t log in…Could anyone tell me what to do so I can log in?!
Any help is very much appreciated.

Thank you

Read full topic
